name: Drone Encounter - Tanks
description:
DroneEncounter

Crazy beast tanks created for you to wipe out your friends in a free for all game mode with parties up to 2/4 players. Prepare for battle!

Input: xBox controller (planning on adding Ps3/4 controller support)

Note that: This game is in it's very early development phase, so i'm looking for a programmer to bring out an online version of this game with many more game modes, vehicles and proper maps to come.

Currently working on: Clean maps with textures, crash fixes and small optimizations

Contact: tristan.gybels@student.howest.be

Feedback is much appreciated😊!
